time.title: Save time
time.description: Too busy, or can't stay near your coffee? Now you can estimate how long you have until it goes cold!

enjoyment.title: Increase enjoyment
enjoyment.description: Enjoy your coffee at an optimal temperature for you! The right temperature and enhance the flavour.

reduce.title: Reduce waste
reduce.description: Never throw out a coffee because it's gone cold again and reduce food waste.

precision.title: Precision Brewing
precision.description: Adjust your brewing techniques to match the climate, ensuring a satisfying and perfectly timed cup regardless of the weather.
